data.title: RWJBH Oncology Support Program
data.meta_description: The RWJBH Oncology Support Program at Monmouth Medical Center in Long Branch, provides support, education and hope to people affected by cancer.
data.text:
Monmouth Medical Center

The RWJBH Oncology Support Program provides support for the physical and emotional concerns of individualsâ€™ affected by cancer. From diagnosis through treatment, recovery and survivorship, we provide members with support, education, hope and encouragement as a part of a community of others who are facing treatment and survivorship together.

With programs running at both our Long Branch and Lakewood campuses, monthly groups include general and diagnosis-specific support groups, educational workshops, strength-building exercise classes, yoga, Qi-Gong, various opportunities for socialization and special lectures emphasizing wellness and the mind-body-spirit connection. All programs are free of charge to our patients and anyone affected by cancer, including family members and support people.

RWJBH Oncology Support Program at Monmouth Medical Center

300 Second Avenue, Long Branch

RWJBH Oncology Support Program at Monmouth Medical Center, Southern Campus

199 Prospect Street, Lakewood

For more information, call 732-923-6090 or email debra.mcgivney@rwjbh.org.
